name: Michelle S.
text: Pizza was delivered exactly 60 minutes after we placed our order (so, right on time), and was still hot when it arrived. We liked that the crust was crunchy on the bottom, but a bit chewy at the edge. Toppings were good. A solid choice for pizza that's better then the national chains.

text: The fastest and friendliest service around. Using only fresh ingredients: meats, cheeses and vegetables, their pizza is always great.
